name: BEST WESTERN York House Hotel

reviews.text: We went to the York House hotel over xmas. From the start of our 4 day stay the staff were very friendly and welcoming. The seaview room was fantastic and very spacious for the 3 of us(including 11 year old son with many xmas pressie). Food and entertainment were good. Would definitely come back again, we are planning to go back for Valentines Day. Overall it was the staff that made the stay 5 star, going out of there way to be hospitable and deliver the best service to guests.
reviews.title: Best hotel we have ever stayed in

reviews.text: We booked into the York House Hotel for xmas as we were visiting family. Most of the hotels in Eastbourne do a four day xmas special which is great but not what we wanted as we were visiting family for two days. The York House could take a booking for two nights B&B which suited us. The public areas of the hotel are fine and relaxing and the bar is busy and lively. The rooms do need a bit of investment but remember this is a 3 star hotel so we didnt expect much. The beds are very small doubles and very uncomfortable, the rooms are basic but you get what you pay for. The highlight of the stay were the very helpful and friendly staff, they looked after us very well and changed our room to a sea view when we complained about the first one they put us in. Overall if I was visiting Eastbourne I would normally book into one of the four star hotels, but if you are doing this on a budget then the York House Hotel is a great option. We booked direct with Best Western but not sure what is the best way to book.
reviews.title: The only option over xmas but good all the same

reviews.text: We had a lovely few days stay and function at this Hotel.
reviews.title: Happy Days

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All of our guest staying at the hotel were happy with their rooms and the service by the staff.
reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.

reviews.text: The breakfast was very good and the meals at the hotel were of a high quality with a good wine list.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked three nights here as a base for some family visits.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: We were very impressed with the room - separate dressing area and wet room.
reviews.title: Business Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are excellent - helpful, courteous and attentive.
reviews.title: Short break in Eastbourne

reviews.text: The food we had - breakfast - was varied and plentiful, although the coffee was I am afraid to say fairly awful.
reviews.title: Cannot be faulted

reviews.text: The swimming pool is a good amenity.
reviews.title: "Lovely bank holiday weekend break"

reviews.text: Stayed here with my husband for two nights. The staff were very helpful and polite. The room was very comfy at night however in the morning due to rooms being renovated around us it was a bit noisy with people talking and drilling going on. Liked our upgrade to seaview room because of the rewards scheme only drawback is again the noise from the road this time. We had dinner here and the food is nice and service good quite reasonable price. Liked the decor of the room not sure about the heating system though looks ugly. The hotel is situated within easy access to the town and pier and parking is discounted which is helpful.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, lovely sea view

reviews.text: My first impression of The York House Hotel was the helpfulness of the staff. They will assist in every way they can to make your stay as enjoyable and as comfortable as they can.
reviews.title: Friendliest and most welcoming hotel I have ever stayed in.

reviews.text: I stayed here in December 2011 and when I had to come back to Eastbourne in February due to a family member passing away I had no hesitation to stay again at this Hotel.
reviews.title: Event

reviews.text: The rooms are very clean and spacious.
reviews.title: Great place to hold an event

reviews.text: The facilities are excellent.
reviews.title: New Years Eve

reviews.text: Stayed two nights as part of a wedding party. The staff in all departments were really excellent - welcoming, helpful, very polite and with a pleasant manner. This makes all the difference in my view to a stay away from home.
reviews.title: excellent staff good public areas and a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Public areas including outside were well fitted out and made it comfortable to meet up with old friends and relatives. Outside areas were especially useful given the superb sunny weather.
reviews.title: One to avoid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was brilliant.
reviews.title: So relaxing

reviews.text: Great location but the decor was very tired and the bathroom was sub-standard. Very basic bedroom accommodation. One of the lifts wasn't working when we arrived, and still wasn't operational when we left. Needs a complete refurb of the bedrooms.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay

reviews.text: My husband and I only stayed for one night but we very much enjoyed our stay. The reception staff were warm, friendly and helpful, the bedroom and bathroom were fab (like a 5* hotel). The most comfiest bed I have ever stayed in (thank you Best Western). The evening meal was delicious and breakfast equally lovely. The staff are all so friendly, we had a room with a sea view and I could hear the sea lapping the shore at night. Sooo relaxing. Even though you have to park on the road, there was plenty of parking available. If you are feeling stressed and want a break from life, I would recommend this hotel. Plenty to do and see in the area.
reviews.title: A hotel on the south coast that delivers

description: Overlooking the Eastbourne seaside front and pier, this branded hotel offers comfortable rooms for all budgets.Fully licenced bar and restaurant are open every day.Conference, weddings and other events facilities are available.Reception and room service operate 24 hours.
